member.name: M:eProjectsOnRealm.ViewModels.LoginViewModel.PasswordRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
^(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[A-Z])(?=.*\\d)[a-zA-Z\\d]{5,}$
Explanation:
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Zero-width positive lookahead.
○ Match a character other than '\n' greedily any number of times.
○ Match a character in the set [a-z].
○ Zero-width positive lookahead.
○ Match a character other than '\n' greedily any number of times.
○ Match a character in the set [A-Z].
○ Zero-width positive lookahead.
○ Match a character other than '\n' greedily any number of times.
○ Match a Unicode digit.
○ Match a character in the set [A-Za-z\d] atomically at least 5 times.
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.name: M:eProjectsOnRealm.ViewModels.LoginViewModel.EmailRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
^ ([w.-] +)@([w -] +)((.(w){2, 3})+)$
Explanation:
○ Match ' '.
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Match ' '.
○ 1st capture group.
○ Match a character in the set [-.w].
○ Match ' ' atomically at least once.
○ Match '@'.
○ 2nd capture group.
○ Match a character in the set [ -w].
○ Match ' ' greedily at least once.
○ 3rd capture group.
○ Loop greedily at least once.
○ 4th capture group.
○ Match any character other than '\n'.
○ 5th capture group.
○ Match 'w'.
○ Match the string "{2, 3}".
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.
